programme.title: Smashing Frank
programme.desc: Four young thieves wearing bunny masks pull off the heists targeting the rich. Calling themselves "Frank," their mission is less about money and more about exposing corruption through graffiti and viral videos. However, when they collide with a powerful church involved in a money-laundering scheme, their mission spirals into a deadly game.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Echoes Of The Thunder
programme.desc: Two half-brothers, Nam and Fire, are top racing drivers. In a racing challenge with Japanese driver Kenji, Nam causes a young racing driver to be seriously injured and is depressed. Fire stands up for Nam and decides to compete with Kenji in an illegal street car race. Who will win the race? Can Nam finally bounce back?

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: A group of bounty hunters, including San, Yo, Cat, Swan and Bobo, are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings that have plagued an international hotel group. Unfortunately, Swan, Cat and Bobo are kidnapped by the mastermind of the bombings. Can San and Yo save them? Will the bounty hunters accomplish their mission?

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: S Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk witnesses a suspect's murder while investigating an illegal soccer gambling case, but is unable to disclose information to Chief Inspector Lau due to his code of confidentiality, thereby hindering Lau's investigation. While starting the case with mutual distrust, they end up reaching a rapport to uproot the crime syndicate.

programme.title: The Locksmith
programme.desc: Locksmith Master Shan suffers from dementia and passes on his skills to Hao Ren, who surpasses him. Detective Liu often seeks Hao Ren's help and they become good friends. When Hao Ren reunites with an old friend one day, he accidentally unfolds the truth behind Shan's wife's disappearance, leading to a chain of mysterious events.

programme.title: The Fierce Wife
programme.desc: An Zhen divorces her husband after his infidelity but faces a pivotal decision four years later - to return to her cheating husband and old life or to embark on a new life with a new love?

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness

programme.title: A Legend
programme.desc: Archaeologist Professor Fang uncovers artifacts from a glacier expedition that resembles a jade pendant in his dream. To unveil the truth, Professor Fang leads his team to a journey into the glacier, embarking on a fantastical adventure together.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: The Monkey King 3
programme.desc: Monkey King, Pigsy and Sandy escort Monk Tang to retrieve the scriptures and accidentally head into the mysterious Female Kingdom. The Queen falls in love with Monk Tang at first sight, but her advisor orders Monk Tang and his disciples to be executed. As the four attract the appearance of River Spirit, the Female Kingdom is plunged into crisis!

programme.title: Hail the Judge
programme.desc: A low level magistrate is run out of town for defending a beautiful murder suspect. Through a series of comedic events he ascends to the top rank & returns looking for revenge.

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80's, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition - to live the American dream.

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur goes undercover with an Interpol agent to protect a new invention, the Seed of God, from falling into an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: VR Fighter
programme.desc: Bodyguard Long Wei has posttraumatic stress disorder after his wife's death. One day, he encounters Amy who works for a VR technology firm and is invited for a new product test. After the test, Long Wei becomes the firm's VR fighter and dons the newly invented armour. However, as mysterious armed men break in, a fierce battle has just begun...

programme.title: All U Need Is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: Life Hotel
programme.desc: Once a gangster, Li struggles to find work to pay for his father's heart surgery. To earn money, he goes undercover to help shut down Life Hotel for a redevelopment project, but gradually forms bonds with its residents. As Li discovers that the hotel serves as a home for the sick, he grapples with his sense of responsibility and empathy.

programme.title: Prosecutor, The
programme.desc: Based on a true case, young Ma Jia Jie pleads guilty to drug trafficking in exchange for a lighter sentence, as coerced by his defense lawyer. Huo Zi Hao, a former cop turned prosecutor, believes in his innocence and launches an investigation. Risking his life and career, Huo is determined to uncover the real perpetrator.

programme.title: May Who?
programme.desc: The story is about a super standard girl in school, May Who, is on a quest to win the love of a school senior heart-throbber, Fame, with her new-found friend, Pong. The only secret is that she can discharge electricity when she gets excited

programme.title: Grandmaster, The
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tian's daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, Tiger Wong is ambushed after he unwittingly took the Lousha Plaque but is saved by his brother Dragon Wong. They also befriended Turbo Shek during the fight and the trio forms a brotherhood. To avenge the death of the Dragon Gate masters, they train and vow to defeat Shibumi, the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: Sex and the Beauties
programme.desc: It is said that Hong Kong is a sexy and sexual city where life is breathtakingly fast but glamorous. Fear of marriage, single & successful psychiatrist, Selina and other beauties seek for love and happy endings.

programme.title: Operation Mekong
programme.desc: After it is discovered that the drugs seized on the Chinese ships had been planted by the henchman of a notorious drug cartel leader named Naw Khar, the governments of Thailand, Laos, Myanmar and China launched a joint task force to apprehend the criminal by sending a band of elite narcotics officers to the Golden Triangle to uncover the truth.

programme.title: The Last Tycoon
programme.desc: Gangster Chen Da Qi rises to the upper echelons of power, but finds himself torn between the love of two women, the murderous plots of the secret service, and the looming threat of war.

programme.title: Everything Is Unknown
programme.desc: Pan Yi Ming receives his father's will stating that he must attend his funeral at home to claim the huge inheritance. When he returns home, he encounters his ex-girlfriend, her husband Hua Qi and his daughter whom he has never met. When Pan discovers that his daughter is being abused by Hua, he vows to save her but eventually fall into their trap

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: Shaolin Intruders
programme.desc: On a routine courier mission, the prestigious Chief was murdered by four mysterious monks. When all evidence pointed to Ching Hua, his friend Lei decides to clear his name by barging in the Shaolin Temple thrice. When Lei thought justice was served for the culprits, he soon realizes the table had turned and the monks stroke again. What follows is a series of intense pursuit for the ultimate villain!

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man's role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Angel with the Iron Fists
programme.desc: Lo Wei directs and stars as the chief detective in this gripping thriller, playing alongside Lily Ho, who excels in the role of an undercover avenger that can fight as well as she flirts! Caught between the crime bosses known as Baldhead and Black Widow, she only has four choices: punch, kick, shoot or bombard with explosives!

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fianc, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent's consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her

programme.title: Clan Feuds
programme.desc: Like legendary director Chu Yuan did so often and so successfully, Chang Peng Yi adapted this film from a story by Ku Lung. Following the footsteps of the equally legendary Chang Cheh, Chang also casted the majestic Ti Lung, along with "Venoms Lo Meng and Sun Chien, for a spectacular showcase of mystical Martial Arts World's intrigue and consummate Kung Fu.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: This supernatural mystery tells the story of a sickly wife and her maid conspiring to kill her beastly husband, leading to a string of events with spooky twists and turns.

programme.title: To Kill a Jaguar
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Shanghai, a village girl journeys to the big city in search of her father and meets her childhood friend Jaguar, who works for the mob boss Kam. In a world controlled by the mobs, it is a test of survival for all as Jaguar allies himself with ace gunman Ko Tang, to take over Kam's empire.

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: In this classic romantic melodrama, nightclub songstress Qing Qing falls for the handsome Peng Nan. However, the two go through an emotional roller coaster of misunderstandings, separations and mutual torment. When the two finally fall back into love, Qing Qing receives a shocking revelation that brings the story to its inevitable sad ending.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: One of the first kung fu comedies, this is a story about a con artist who uses kung fu to swindle villagers for money by pretending to be possessed by spirits. When they are threatened by bandits, he must use the same skills for good.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeeper's daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the family's young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huo's stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lung's house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lung's mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: Heroes of the East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma ends when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huang's wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: As more people are learning martial arts from Shaolin, the Qing court orders for it to be banned and plans to destroy the temple. The Shaolin disciples decide to take their protest to the streets, using Shaolin skills to curb their hatred, but when the Qing troops start attacking Shaolin Temple, the disciples vow to protect it at all costs.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy House of 72 tenants, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: Return Of The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and announced that he will steal a diamond from a rich man's party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chief's granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: Asia-pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.title: Honey Bunny & The Catici Legacy S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar

programme.desc: Bella, Genevieve, Amelia, Tally & Kate - The series continues to follow detectives Jason Grant and Nikki Batista of the Philadelphia Police Department's Missing Persons Unit (MPU) as they undertake intense searches for missing individuals.

programme.title: DOC S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Try, Try Again - While at the hospital recovering, Amy can't help but insert herself into her roommate's case. Meanwhile, all the other doctors and nurses have to adjust to the once formidable Chief now being the patient.

programme.title: NCIS: SYDNEY S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Blood Is Thicker Than Vodka - The discovery of an exsanguinated sailor takes NCIS: Sydney into the world of modern-day vampires, family feuds, bespoke vodka and a nocturnal matriarch with a penchant for blood.

programme.title: HUDSON & REX S6 Ep9
programme.desc: Doghouse - Charlie and Rex go undercover in prison to investigate the murder of David Aziz, a Robin Hood criminal Charlie arrested in the past.

programme.title: ROOKIE BLUE S3 Ep1
programme.desc: The First Day of the Rest of Your Life - When a mysterious young girl vanishes from the scene of a multi-car accident, Andy McNally connects the girl to a 7-year-old cold case. Still on suspension, Andy, and the rest of 15 Division work overtime to find the missing girl and her captor...just in time for Andy to make it to her Tribunal.

programme.title: FBI S6 Ep2
programme.desc: Remorse - After the president of the NY Fed is gunned down trying to help a young woman in peril, the team races to find the killer and the missing woman. Additionally, a distressing connection to one of Jubal's past cases is revealed during the investigation, compounding the pressure on him as he also deals with his son's school suspension.

programme.title: HUDSON & REX S6 Ep10
programme.desc: Who's Your Caddy? - When Jennica Malouf, a wealthy socialite, turns up dead on a golf course, Charlie and Rex discover a world full of scandal, gossip and buried secrets.

programme.title: CSI: VEGAS S3 Ep8
programme.desc: The Artist is Present - The CSI team investigates when a plastinated nervous system is found hanging above a local car dealership. Also, Chavez and Max search for a missing source in their ongoing investigation of the robotics factory.

programme.title: FBI: MOST WANTED S5 Ep8
programme.desc: Supply Chain - A drug deal between two teens is interrupted when a middle-aged woman abducts them at gunpoint, sending the Fugitive Task Force on the hunt to rescue them. Also, Nina and Scola (FBI) bump heads over parenting styles.

programme.title: DOC S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Day One - Amy, allowed to return to work under strict guidelines, teams up with TJ to treat a patient suffering from mysterious liver problems. Sonya and Jake help an elderly couple navigate the final chapter of their love story.

programme.title: NCIS: SYDNEY S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Mango Madness - There's big trouble in the Top End as NCIS: Sydney brave crocs, midges and 'mango madness' to investigate a US-Australian training exercise that turns deadly.

programme.title: BOSTON BLUE S1 Ep9
programme.desc: In BOSTON BLUE, a universe expansion of the long-running top drama BLUE BLOODS, Wahlberg will reprise his role as NYPD officer Danny Reagan as he takes a position with Boston PD. Once in Boston, he is paired with detective Lena Peters, the eldest daughter of a prominent law enforcement family.

programme.desc: Best Laid Plans - When a retired FBI agent is tortured and killed while working a security job, Scola and Nina (FBI: MOST WANTED) go undercover as a married couple deep in the diamond game as the team tries to find out who is responsible. During the course of his and Nina's dangerous assignment, Scola is plagued by the possibility that their son Doug could end up parentless.

programme.desc: End Game - Our ancient powers have endured for centuries but destruction is close at hand. What will cause their downfall? And who will create a lasting legacy?

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Deion Sanders - The retired footballer travels to the southern Utah desert after his kids accuse him of softness. They hike through the desert, but Deion's fear of snakes causes problems when they encounter one in the wild.

programme.title: Amazing Railway Adventures with Nick Knowles S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Croatia - Nick Knowles travels from the Alps to the Adriatic in another entertaining railway adventure as he journeys by train through the breath-taking scenery of Slovenia and Croatia.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Frenchness - Griff Rhys Jones continues his journey across Canada, heading to Quebec and Montreal to experience the French Canadian way of life, which includes sampling poutine, Maple syrup and the obsession with ice hockey.

programme.title: Blue Planet II S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Green Seas - From enchanted kelp forests to undersea prairies, the planet's green seas teem with life. They are the most abundant but fiercely competitive places in the ocean to live.

programme.title: Patrick Aryee's Wild World S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jaguar - Biologist Patrick Aryee is in Costa Rica to witness the annual mass nesting of sea turtles, as well as the predatory jaguars that come in for the kill.

programme.title: Kingdom S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The final chapter. Olimba struggles with old age, and the wild dog story takes an unexpected turn. The lions and the hyenas both enjoy a baby boom - but who has the power to rule?

programme.title: Incredible Journeys with Simon Reeve S1 Ep1
programme.desc: In this first episode, Simon revisits the incredible characters he's met while travelling the globe and catches up with a ten-year-old boy he met working in terrible conditions in Bangladesh.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild S4 Ep5
programme.desc: Revisit: Rathlin Island - Ben Fogle revisits Rauri on Rathlin Island, who left HR for off-grid life. They repaint Rauri's house and discuss his health struggles, and a daring journey he made to help those in need.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Tom Arnold - Bear Grylls is joined by Tom Arnold on an adventure through the mountains of Oregon. This adventure begins with a helicopter ride to an isolated forest.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fly Free - Observe vet Karina's fight to save a koala mauled by dogs, then face the clinic's toughest customer with vet Tim: a rainbow lorikeet who's quick to bite. Scoop up a peeved possum with rescuer Chantel and bond with Meaghan over a gaggle of goslings.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Einstein Rules - Come full circle as the dry season descends and the Waterfront Pride enjoys good hunting and renewed confidence in their territory. Then celebrate the success of former outsider Einstein, who gets down to business as the king of his very own pride.

programme.title: After The Wildfires
programme.desc: Examine fire's pivotal role in shaping Australia's natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020's brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continent's wildlife.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Oceans - Dive to the darkest depths of the sea to uncover the ocean's most mysterious inhabitants. Journey across vast stretches of open water with humpback whales, then wander down to the ocean floor to witness breathtaking bioluminescence.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Penguin Proposal - Watch an Antarctic gentoo penguin pop the question with a rocky token of his devotion, then learn how a Madagascar lemur uses toxic millipedes for pest control. Bone up on makeup techniques with a flamingo and meet a honey badger that can pick locks.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep2
programme.desc: House Hunting Hermit Crabs - Get in line with hermit crabs for an orderly shell exchange on a Belize beach, then meet a Senegalese chimp's pet genet. Float with an otter who swaps hostages for free meals and admire the agricultural prowess of leafcutter ants in the rainforest.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Punks Strike Back - After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.desc: Reptile Runabout - Weave through Queensland's coastal chaos, where Jess faces her fears chasing a lace monitor lizard up a tree with an active beehive. Watch Stu cut a trapped eastern brown out of a fence and see Mick hunt a slippery python for terrified homeowners.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hot and Bothered - Dive into tight spaces, underneath hot houses, and into tense rescue situations as the catchers confront a six-foot-long, highly venomous brown snake. Then watch Stu and Liv relocate a coastal python threatening the safety of a homeowner's pets.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Chasing Scales - Storm into a new suburb, where the wranglers keep deadly snakes from slipping into family homes. Watch as Stu and Liv pull an eastern brown from a job site, Jess and Dan expel a python from a shed, and Mick and Adele evict a red belly from a bedroom.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Home Invasion - Respond to danger on a rural property with Mick and Adele, who brave a fired-up brown snake. Tread carefully as Jess and Dan extract a python from a play area, and get spooked when a chicken-hunting python squashes Liv's hand during a tense rescue.

programme.title: Chasing The Rains S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Praying for Rain - Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenix's search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Inside Story - Look behind the scenes and meet the innovative teams working to preserve and protect Kenya's wildlife. Check out Save the Elephants' radio-tracking-collar system, a drone that monitors wild dog packs, and a local team of Maasai cheetah trackers.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Hollywoods Held Hostage - During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Queen of Yala - The shadowy forests of Yala National Park are the perfect hideout for secretive leopards. It's time for one young female, Asha, to strike out alone. Join her as she fights for her own territory, finds a mate, and becomes a mother.

programme.desc: Humans vs Animals - Humans have sharp senses, which we use to explore our environment. They give us the information we need to survive. But some animals have taken those senses and, through evolution, turned them into marvels of biological engineering.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Chimpanzee - Track chimpanzees through the Rwandan forest with Max, who tries to convince these powerful monkeys that he's a friend, not a foe. Pick up some key tips on jungle dining and witness complex family dynamics, including grooming and socializing.

programme.title: Uptown Otters S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Battle for the Bay - Follow the Bay Family's matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies' leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: Uptown Otters S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Queen of the Bay - Chase Anna to the Townies' lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies' first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a park's main attraction.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Next Dynasty - The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Loka the Baby Elephant - Every year, the biggest elephant congregation in Asia occurs in Minneriya National Park. Here in this sacred place, baby Loka is born. Watch as he learns to suckle, swim and handle his trunk among the mle of giants that make up his family.

programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 7 - Jason is in the Dubai Marina as he explores food that looks so good it goes viral.

programme.desc: The Great New Year Bake Off - Familiar faces from Bake Off past - Maxy, Jrgen, Maggie and Mark - battle it out to win the first Star Baker of 2024, before seeing the New Year in with a performance from Bone-Afide.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Liam and Hannah's Shepherd's Hut - Situated in a water meadow in north Dorset, rare breed farmers Liam and Hannah's 1930s shepherd's hut was bought for just 5 almost 40 years ago. Simon and the team help them to restore it.

programme.desc: Faith's Geodome - Simon and the team go to Devon where camp site owner Faith wants to create a unique property using an invention of her late father's. Faith wants the B&B's rooms to have a celestial theme.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Monstrous Mayhem of the Massive Melviathan - A run-of-the-mill arts and crafts session turns into an interdimensional adventure from which Harold, George and company may never return.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Savage Spite of the Slimy Salamangler - Krupp's campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Cunning Combat of the Covert Camoflush - The campers' splat-tastic game of paintball is rather rudely interrupted by a foul and formidable fiend known only as Camoflush.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep67
programme.desc: Inner Children - JJ reluctantly lets Tina take over her assistant duties for the day, but a Tina slip-up leads to an outbreak of town adults drinking diluted special formula that makes them all baby-brained. When JJ discovers this, she works with R & D Baby Simmons and Security Baby Katja to antidote the wobbling Adult Babies before Tina can find out and blame herself.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep68
programme.desc: Poompf! - Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tina's startup company for exploding baby Iggy's favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corp's current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep69
programme.desc: The Heat is On - On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict no-babies policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Joy Story - When Eep and Dawn find a stranded egg, they eagerly take it in as their new pet, but when they learn the egg is not what it seems, they have to return it before it becomes dangerous.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep20
programme.desc: The Big Shine - When Grug overhears Thunk accidentally call Phil "Dad", he tries to reconnect with Thunk by taking him to the natural spectacle known as "Big Shine."

programme.desc: Featherhide - Tom and the others debate how to keep the dragons a secret, even as a rambunctious young cloaking dragon gets loose in town and pursues a friendship with a reluctant Alex.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Itty Bitty Blossom - The dollhouse delivery is a special plant called an Itty Bitty Blossom that goes from newborn to full-grown in one day. Gabby and Pandy have to take care of the whiny and fussy growing Itty Bitty Blossom and make sure it is in its permanent soil spot before it's fully grown.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Dollhouse Store Day - When Gabby unboxes a coin purse with kitty coins, it's Store Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy help out at all the different stores (Cakey's Bakery, Baby Box's Craft Emporium, Kitty Fairy's Flower Shoppe) to earn kitty coins and save up for a melodicat at the Grand Opening of DJ Catnip's Music Store!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Kitty Fairy's Sleepover - When Gabby, Pandy and the Gabby Cats prepare for a sleepover in the Garden, they discover Pillow Cat has never been to a sleepover. They help her conquer her fears and enjoy her first sleepover.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Let's Make A Movie! - When Gabby unboxes two little containers of popcorn and two movie tickets, it's movie night in the dollhouse! Demanding Director CatRat leads the Gabby Cats through a Gabby-fied version of a classic story, Gabby-locks and the Three Bears.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Pete The Polar Bear - Pete the Polar Bear shows up for a vacation on MerCat's sunny beach. Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats show Pete he can have a great vacation, even if things don't go precisely to plan.

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 Ep28
programme.desc: Speed - Ty can't stop rolling after Skrap-It steals his master cylinder, so the Trux must quickly figure out a fix before he falls off the edge of a cliff

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo's Jungle Drums - Raa Raa has found an infectious beat, and soon all the other animals in the jungle are joining in except for Ooo Ooo, who just can't get the beat right. How can they find a way for all the friends to play together?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Topsy's Musical Stones - Topsy has readied the musical stones for a noisy game. Raa Raa has been left in charge, making sure that nobody jumps on them while Topsy reminds the other jungle inhabitants about the game. But temptation can be strong especially when Ooo Ooo is about...

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Noisy Present - Raa Raa has made his friend Topsy a wonderful present - a noisy set of chimes. But she doesn't want them. Who else in the jungle might like a very noisy set of wind chimes?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Big Roar - Raa Raa finds it really funny that all his friends come running every time he roars really loudly. The other jungle inhabitants are less amused, they only come because there are worried about their friend. What is Raa Raa to do when he gets into trouble and nobody comes to his rescue?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Scritch Scratch - Raa Raa always scratches his claws in the morning, but his scratching post has fallen apart. He sets off to find himself a new one in the jungliest bit. When he does eventually find a new scratching post it is huge, how is he going to get it home again?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Hurry Up Raa Raa - Raa Raa has agreed to do too many things with too many people today. Will he be able to do them and keep all his friends happy? More importantly, will it make him happy?

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Pandy's Birthday - It's Pandy's birthday!! The dollhouse is throwing a surprise party for him! Gabby goes room to room preparing all his favorite things for the party, but when the big moment comes, Pandy drops his cake! Gabby consoles him and tells him it's even better - now, they have smash cake! They all hold up a piece and pose for a picture.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Dollhouse Hotel - When Gabby unboxes a suitcase and a hotel brochure, it's time to take a trip to The Dollhouse Hotel! Hotel guests Gabby and Pandy check in with the Hotel Manager DJ Catnip then go to Mercat's Spa and even order room service from Pillow Cat! For our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Pillow Cat sings a song!

programme.title: SPIRIT OF CHRISTMAS (RIDING FREE) S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Spirit Of Christmas - Lucky and friends must figure out how to get home in time for Christmas when a falling boulder -- and a serious snowstorm -- derail their travel plans.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus - When Boss Baby accidentally gets mistaken for an elf and sent to the North Pole on Christmas Eve, he mobilizes unpaid elf workers against an old nemesis: that charity-loving hippie people call Santa Claus. Meanwhile, Tim races to the North Pole to get his baby brother back home in time for Templeton Family Christmas traditions.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas Special - George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvin's time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didn't work quite how they'd hoped. George and Harold realize they need to help Santa remember the true meaning of Christmas before it's gone forever!

programme.title: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays - Oh takes it upon himself to introduce Christmas joy to his fellow Boovs. Unfortunately, his well-meaning mission nearly destroys the city.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep70
programme.desc: One Tricked Pony - An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits' fun playtime. Meanwhile, the company makes its first purchase: upgraded communicators! R & D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, Bridges Aflame. Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep71
programme.desc: Federal Slumber Party - Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, he's applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Baby's cover at stake, it's up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep72
programme.desc: Floaties - A bummed out Tina takes a vacation to the baby resort, Floaties! However, her mind is still back at work, and struggled to actually enjoy her vacation. And it gets worse when Crispin Biscuits switches electronic ID tags with her, causing everyone to assume Tina actually is Crispin Biscuits. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.desc: Fossa and Gecko - Steve and Aneeshwar meet a family of fossa clambering in the trees. Then they go to see a leaf-tailed gecko, an animal that looks different but has the same skill as the fossa.

programme.title: Playtime Towers S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Cats - Bella has fun pretending to be a cat - a Bella-Cat. Together with Lift, she visits Tincy the Spider in the Sing Song Forest, who sings a spider rhyme all about taily-waily animals!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep18
programme.desc: The History Badge - The Squirrels get an interactive history lesson from Duggee and a host of famous faces.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep17
programme.desc: The Sharing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels bake a pie and learn how to share by dividing things between them

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep16
programme.desc: The Philosophy Badge - The Squirrels think about life's big questions, and gain their Philosophy badges.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep37
programme.desc: Mars Mission, Chile - Xuli and Foz help NASA after a close encounter with a UFO makes them lose the Mars Rover.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep36
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Around The World In 80 Days - It's a rainy day and the team are stuck inside, so Foz reads them his favourite book: Around the World in 80 Days by Jules Verne. The Go Jetters are soon imagining they are characters from the story.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep16
programme.desc: Rangers of the Rails - A bit bored by her surroundings, Emily longs to go on a fun adventure and experience something new and exciting. It's not long before her wish is granted.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mouse's Birthday - Sarah's hoping for a nice quiet birthday, but there's no chance once her friends arrive.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Fast Slow Bungalow - Flamingo and John give Sarah and Duck a tour of their home and invite them to play a game.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Flower - Fifi asks Stanley to help her find a new place for her friend Isabelle the Sun-bell Daisy. This proves trickier than initially planned as Isabelle has some specific needs.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Den - Little Woo and Seamus call Stanley to help them build a den so they can watch the bugs in the forest without disturbing them. Stanley builds a giant, camouflaged den on legs.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep51
programme.desc: Round and Round - Jeanie says going round in circles won't help find a missing key, but Monty isn't so sure.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep33
programme.desc: It's time for Halloween - JoJo and Gran Gran are getting ready for a Halloween party, but when JoJo accidentally squashes their spooky pumpkin lantern, they need a replacement! Luckily Gran Gran has a Gran Gran Plan!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep43
programme.desc: Dragon - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep44
programme.desc: Wild Girls - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep45
programme.desc: TV Shop - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep21
programme.desc: The Mystery Badge - The squirrels have to solve the mystery of the missing red ruby.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep20
programme.desc: The Crazy Golf Badge - It's crazy golf time and the everyone has to make their own courses.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Stick Time - How many siblings does Norrie have? What's Duggee's favourite badge? What does everyone do on Fridays? Squirrel Club has the answers!

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Table Mountain, South Africa - Glitch wants to ski, so the Grimbots give Table Mountain a snowy peak, which threatens its rare plants.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Cauliflower - It's Cauliflower creaking away as she grows and sings her catchy "Cauliflower Creak" song.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Chilli Peppers - It's the bagpipe playing Chilli Peppers performing their song "We're Chilli When It's Hot"

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep18
programme.desc: The Great Book Rescue - Evil Pea takes all the books from the Supermarket. Supertato, Chilli and Carrot try to rescue all the books by using acrobatic skills they learnt from their favourite circus book.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Hiccup Havoc - Supertato gets hiccups while Evil Pea is firing jam at Tato Tower. Supertato harnesses the power of his hiccups to save Tato Tower from Evil Pea's jam attack.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Circus - It's Teletubby Circus time! Tinky Winky balances on the tight rope, Dipsy juggles, Laa-Laa flies on the trapeze and Po is a funny clown.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S6 Ep16
programme.desc: Pumpkin - Dee encourages a friend to say 'pumpkin', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Fly Spy - The friends come together to plan a secret surprise for Fly. However, as Hooper and Fly find out there's a big secret, they try to use their super-spy plan to discover what the surprise is.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Sneezy Wheezy - Everyone in OKIDO has been kept awake by a mysterious sound. Messy and his friends go to find its source and discover that the giants need their help.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Bedroom - Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep47
programme.desc: Cricket - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep1
programme.desc: The Carrot Badge - The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep20
programme.desc: The Midnight Badge - Loveable Duggee and the Squirrels return with more educational fun.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep4
programme.desc: What's Hot? - Billy and the Sillies introduce a visit to chicken A&E, the Squirrels build a bug house, Norrie has her chance to shine, and the Penguins give facts about what's hot and what's not.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep5
programme.desc: I'm Hungry - King Tiger and the Jelly wonder what Duggee has planned for today. Tag wants a snack, Enid has a musical cheese chase, and Norrie has a haircut.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Table Mountain, South Africa - Glitch wants to ski, so the Grimbots give Table Mountain a snowy peak, which threatens its rare plants.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Keepy Uppy - Bluey, Bingo and Mum are enjoying playing Keepy-Uppy around the house, when Dad joins in and the game becomes the ultimate test of skill.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Hairdressers - During a game of hairdressers, Bluey discovers that big-headed customer Dad has nits! To help treat them Bingo has to find her voice, while Bluey has to find her ears.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Andy and the Black Bear Cubs - In this episode, Andy, Jen and Scout head to Alaska, America on a baby animal mission to help rescue some black bear cubs high up in a tree. Along the way, Andy meets a grumpy Arctic ground squirrel.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Royval vs. Kape
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC will close out its 2025 campaign with an electric flyweight matchup as top contenders Brandon Raw Dawg Royval shares the Octagon with Manel Starboy Kape on December 14 at the UFC APEX in Las Vegas. A former title challenger and perennial contender, Royval holds wins over Kai Kara-France, Brandon Moreno, and Tatsuro Taira and currently sits at No. 3 in the divisional rankings. Following an uneven start to his UFC tenure, the dynamic Kape has amassed a 6-1 record over his last seven outings, entering off back-to-back stoppage wins over Asu Almabayev and Bruno Silva
